author: ARA
title: El papa Francisco sufre un cuadro clÃ­nico \
text:
El papa Francisco sufre un cuadro clÃ­nico "complejo"
El pontÃ­fice ingresÃ³ en un hospital de Roma el pasado viernes
BarcelonaEl pasado viernes, tras reunirse con el primer ministro de Eslovaquia, el papa Francisco fue hospitalizado en el PoliclÃ­nico Agostino Gemelli de Roma por tratarse de una "bronquitis". Tres dÃ­as despuÃ©s de su ingreso, el Vaticano ha explicado que las pruebas realizadas hasta ahora apuntan a que sufre "una infecciÃ³n polimicrobiana del tracto respiratorio" y que su cuadro clÃ­nico es "complejo". Por ello, segÃºn informaron, el pontÃ­fice requiere de una "hospitalizaciÃ³n adecuada".
Matteo Bruni, portavoz de la iglesia, ha explicado que el cambio en su tratamiento no se corresponde a un "agravamiento" de su estado de salud, sino que es fruto de los resultados de los anÃ¡lisis elaborados en los Ãºltimos dÃ­as. En ellas, se ha detectado una evaluaciÃ³n mÃ¡s completa de la patologÃ­a; en este caso, una infecciÃ³n polimicrobiana. Bruni, que no fijÃ³ ninguna fecha para una posible alta hospitalaria, asegurÃ³ que en estos momentos el Papa "se encuentra de buen humor".
Previamente, el portavoz del Vaticano habÃ­a explicado que el pontÃ­fice ha pasado la noche "tranquilo". "Ha desayunado y se ha dedicado a la lectura de periÃ³dicos", asegurÃ³. Por otro lado, este lunes tambiÃ©n se ha sabido que el papa Francisco, pese a su hospitalizaciÃ³n, ha continuado comunicÃ¡ndose a diario con la parroquia de la Sagrada Familia de Gaza, la Ãºnica catÃ³lica en la zona. "Nos llamÃ³ el viernes y el sÃ¡bado, tenÃ­a la voz algo cansada, pero estaba de buen humor y querÃ­a saber cÃ³mo estÃ¡bamos", ha explicado un miembro de la parroquia a un canal de televisiÃ³n de Mediaset en Italia.
A estas alturas, la oficina del papa ya ha modificado la agenda del pontÃ­fice en los prÃ³ximos dÃ­as. En concreto, ha quedado anulada la audiencia general prevista para este miÃ©rcoles y ha quedado en el aire su presencia en la misa por el jubileo de los diÃ¡conos del domingo.

author: Edvaldo Barone
title: Patti Smith cancela show em SÃ£o Paulo apÃ³s mal sÃºbito durante apresentaÃ§Ã£o
text:
A renomada cantora e poetisa do movimento punk Patti Smith anunciou o cancelamento de sua apresentaÃ§Ã£o marcada para esta quinta-feira, 30 de novembro, no Teatro Cultura ArtÃ­stica , em SÃ£o Paulo. A decisÃ£o foi tomada apÃ³s a artista sofrer um mal sÃºbito durante sua performance na noite anterior, ao lado do grupo experimental Soundwalk Collective .
Desmaio durante apresentaÃ§Ã£o Durante o show na quarta-feira, 29, a icÃ´nica artista de 78 anos desabou no palco, gerando grande preocupaÃ§Ã£o entre os fÃ£s e a equipe. Na manhÃ£ seguinte, Patti usou suas redes sociais para tranquilizar seus seguidores, afirmando que havia experimentado uma â€œtontura pÃ³s-enxaquecaâ€ e que recebeu atendimento mÃ©dico logo apÃ³s o incidente. â€œEstou bem, confiem em mimâ€, escreveu a cantora.
Comunicado sobre o cancelamento Inicialmente, o evento ainda foi mantido, mas Ã  tarde, a produÃ§Ã£o do show emitiu um comunicado oficial informando sobre o cancelamento . No texto, assinado por Patti e sua equipe, ela expressou seu pesar pela situaÃ§Ã£o: â€œQueridos amigos de SÃ£o Paulo, Ã© com muita tristeza que decidimos cancelar a apresentaÃ§Ã£o de hoje Ã  noite no Teatro Cultura ArtÃ­stica. A Patti estÃ¡ se recuperando bem, mas nossos mÃ©dicos atenciosos dizem que ela precisa de um pouco mais de tempo para estar no seu melhor.â€
A nota tambÃ©m agradeceu ao pÃºblico pelo apoio e pelas mensagens de carinho recebidas: â€œNÃ£o podemos expressar o quanto somos gratos pelo amor, apoio e compreensÃ£o contÃ­nuos de todos vocÃªs. Mal podemos esperar para voltar a SÃ£o Paulo assim que possÃ­vel. Com amor, Soundwalk Collective & Patti Smith.â€

author: Kevin Reagan
title: 1 dead after car hits deer near Flagstaff
text: FLAGSTAFF, Ariz. â€” One person died after a car traveling along Interstate 40 east of Flagstaff hit a deer early Thursday morning, officials said. The vehicle hit the deer near milepost 207 at about 1 a.m. and the car was then subsequently hit by semi truck, according to the Arizona Department of Public Safety. One person in the passenger vehicle died at the scene and their identity has not been disclosed. The semi's driver sustained head injuries. Thursday's crash had resulted in roadway closures for several hours. The right eastbound lane of I-40 recently reopened and left lane remained closed. UP TO SPEED Watch 12News+ for free You can now watch 12News content anytime, anywhere thanks to the 12News+ app! The free 12News+ app from 12News lets users stream live events â€” including daily newscasts like "Today in AZ" and "12 News" and our daily lifestyle program, "Arizona Midday"â€”on [Roku](https://channelstore.roku.com/details/a3f3d79ace515f097f8b184ea324d7df/12-news-kpnx-arizona) and [Amazon Fire TV](https://www.amazon.com/TEGNA-12-News-KPNX/dp/B014EMXTJS/ref=sr_1_1?crid=UUFCXBZT1AJ5&keywords=kpnx+12+news&qid=1655746122&s=mobile-apps&sprefix=kpnx+12+news%2Cmobile-apps%2C92&sr=1-1). 12News+ showcases live video throughout the day for breaking news, local news, weather and even an occasional moment of Zen showcasing breathtaking sights from across Arizona. Users can also watch on-demand videos of top stories, local politics, I-Team investigations, Arizona-specific features and vintage videos from the 12News archives. Roku: [Add the channel from the Roku store](https://channelstore.roku.com/search/kpnxc2c3fbf690639/st-louis-news-from-ksdk) or by searching for "12 News KPNX." Amazon Fire TV: Search for "12 News KPNX" to [find the free 12News+ app to add to your account](https://www.amazon.com/TEGNA-12-News-KPNX/dp/B014EMXTJS/ref=sr_1_1?crid=UUFCXBZT1AJ5&keywords=kpnx+12+news&qid=1655746122&s=mobile-apps&sprefix=kpnx+12+news%2Cmobile-apps%2C92&sr=1-1), or have the 12News+ app delivered directly to your Amazon Fire TV through Amazon.com or the Amazon app. How big is Maricopa County? Maricopa County is the United Statesâ€™ 4th largest county in terms of population with 4,485,414 people, according to the 2020 Census. The county contains around 63% of Arizonaâ€™s population and is 9,224 square miles. That makes the county larger than seven U.S. states (Rhode Island, Delaware, Connecticut, Hawaii, New Jersey, Massachusetts and New Hampshire). One of the largest park systems in the nation is also located in Maricopa County. The county has an estimated 120,000 acres of open space parks that includes hundreds of miles of trails, nature centers and campgrounds. The countyâ€™s seat is located in Phoenix, which is also the state capital and the census-designated 5th most populous city in the United States. The county was named after the Maricopa, or Piipaash, Native American Tribe.

author: Jack Lindner jlindner@mdjonline.com
title: Keke's Breakfast Cafe Opens in Kennesaw
text:
KENNESAW â€” Kekeâ€™s Breakfast Cafe, a popular Florida-based restaurant chain, has opened in Kennesaw.
Its newest location at the Kennesaw Walk shopping center opened Thursday, becoming the franchiseâ€™s first restaurant in Georgia. But it wonâ€™t be alone, as the franchise plans to open another location in Roswell in March.
Like the name suggests, Kekeâ€™s specializes in all-things breakfast from classic pancakes to omelets.
Location co-owner Jordan Swan said the menuâ€™s variety is what helps set them apart, since they donâ€™t just serve big pancakes and other large, sugar-filled breakfast items.
â€œKekeâ€™s can be as indulging as you want, or as healthy as you want,â€ Swan said. â€œYou can get healthy omelets, you can get tomato slices as sides ... We definitely cater to customers who have allergies or gluten-free needs.â€
Some of the restaurantâ€™s most popular items include their Greek omelet with baby spinach, diced tomato and feta cheese; the cheese steak omelet with green pepper, onion and white American cheese; and their Florida pancakes topped with strawberries, banana, blueberries and powdered sugar.
Another fan-favorite is the stuffed French toast, which comes in seven different varieties and flavors. Each platter of quarter-cut French toast is stuffed with cream cheese and topped with powdered sugar and choice of fruit-based fillings including raspberries, blueberries, apple-cinnamon and banana caramel pecan.
For the non-breakfast customers, Kekeâ€™s offers various lunch items including paninis, salads, cheeseburgers and wraps.

author: @curricularhq
title: We Tested 40 Python Courses. Here Are the Best. ðŸ‘¨â€ðŸ’»ðŸš€
text: At Curricular, my team and I spend hundreds of hours every month reviewing courses and programs from around the web to recommend the very best. Our goal is to help developers cut through the marketing hype, make quick and confident buying decisions, and get the most from their time and money. You can check out all our learning guides at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev?utm_source=devto&src=Pythonguide). We spent several hundred hours meticulously testing and reviewing several dozen Python courses from various vendors around the web. Here are the absolute best online Python courses available right now. We independently test and review every course that we recommend. If you purchase a course we recommend, we may earn a commission. Our team includes developers and learning experts who have worked at most of the major learning platforms, but we don't have active employment relationships with any. [ ](#our-top-pick) Our Top Pick [ ](#udacitys-full-stack-developer-nanodegree) Udacity's [Full Stack Developer Nanodegree](https://imp.i115008.net/Qyv4WY) $249 per month | 4 months at 10-15 hours per week The best self-paced Python course money can buy. It's expensive, but well worth the cost for the quality of instruction and the quality of feedback on your work. The emphasis on practice exercises and real-world hands-on projects are standout features. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Emphasis on Hands-on Learning - Frequent Practice - Graded Portfolio Projects - Earning an Industry-Recognized Credential [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#udacity_python) [ ](#runner-up) Runner Up [ ](#edxs-cs50-web-development-with-python-and-javascript) edX's [CS50 Web Development with Python and JavaScript](https://www.edx.org/learn/python/harvard-university-cs50-s-introduction-to-programming-with-python) $199 for certificate (free to audit) | 30-40 hours The gold standard for online courses provides the best way for programmers to learn basic Python and how to build web apps with Django and PostgreSQL. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Aimed at Novice Programmers - Combines Lectures & Homework Challenges - Polished Course Materials - Certificate Available [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#cs50_python) [ ](#another-great-option) Another Great Option [ ](#app-academy-opens-python-flask-and-sqlalchemy) App Academy Open's [Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy](https://www.appacademy.io/course/app-academy-open) Free | 40 hours Solid free option for learning professional-grade Python web development. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Aimed at Novice Programmers - Learning Without Videos - Frequent Practice Throughout [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#aaopen_python) [ ](#another-great-option) Another Great Option [ ](#codecademys-build-python-web-apps-with-flask-skill-path) Codecademy's [Build Python Web Apps with Flask Skill Path](https://www.codecademy.com/learn/paths/build-python-web-apps-flask) $29.99 per month | 10 weeks at 10 hours per week A solid option for learning to build web applications with Python and Flask, with engaging hands-on practice and a few challenging projects. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Emphasis on Hands-on learning - Getting Started Quickly (No Config Required) - Includes Practice Projects [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#codecademy_python) [ ](#another-great-option) Another Great Option [ ](#educatives-become-a-flask-developer) Educative's [Become a Flask Developer](https://www.educative.io/path/become-a-flask-developer) $25 per month | 18 hours Great option if you want to learn without videos, and curate your own Python and Flask learning path from a disparate set of materials. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Gets You Up to Speed Quickly - Solid Resource for Ongoing Reference - Emphasis on Learning by Doing [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#educative_python) [ ](#another-great-option) Another Great Option [ ](#freecodecamps-scientific-computing-with-python-certification) FreeCodeCamp's [Scientific Computing with Python Certification](https://www.freecodecamp.org/learn/scientific-computing-with-python/) Free | 30 hours This leaning path combines Dr. Chuck's excellent "Python for Everybody" course with autograded coding problems. [ ](#why-its-great) Why It's Great - Beginner-friendly - Expert-led Learning - Frequent Practice Throughout the Course [ ](#read-our-full-review-at-curriculardev) Read Our Full Review at [curricular.dev](https://curricular.dev/quickstarts/python_web_quickstart#freecodecamp_python) I hope you found this list helpful. author: Elizabeth Tucker / Journal Digital Producer
title: How to harvest rainwater in New Mexico | Local News | abqjournal.com
text:
The last several days have provided much needed rain for the residents of Albuquerque .
If you noticed a lot of rain collecting in your yard and thought it could be put to better use, consider harvesting the rainwater.

author: Kevin Monte Gonzalez
title: Turista fue presa de cocodrilo: lo mordiÃ³ cuando iba a tomarse una selfie | VIDEO
text:
Exclusivo
[Buena Vida]
Turista fue presa de cocodrilo: lo mordiÃ³ cuando iba a tomarse una selfie | VIDEO
Turista atacado por un cocodrilo en Filipinas tras ingresar a su jaula para tomarse una selfie. El reptil lo mordiÃ³ y lo arrastrÃ³ durante 30 minutos
Una escalofriante escena ocurriÃ³ en un zoolÃ³gico de Filipinas cuando un turista de 29 aÃ±os fue brutalmente atacado por un cocodrilo tras ingresar a su jaula para tomarse una selfie. El incidente, registrado en video, se viralizÃ³ rÃ¡pidamente en redes sociales por la imprudencia y la violencia del momento.
Lee tambiÃ©n:
El genio de la lÃ¡mpara: Esto trata la divertida tendencia de IA que arrasa en redes
ConfundiÃ³ al cocodrilo con una estatua
El hecho tuvo lugar en el zoolÃ³gico Kabug Mangrove Park and Wetlands, donde el joven visitante confundiÃ³ al cocodrilo con una escultura decorativa. Sin advertir el peligro, cruzÃ³ la valla de seguridad para acercarse al animal y sacarse una foto.
A los pocos segundos, el cocodrilo reaccionÃ³ y lo atacÃ³ con fuerza. El reptil, una hembra llamada Lalay, le mordiÃ³ el brazo y lo arrastrÃ³ violentamente por el recinto, mientras el pÃºblico presente observaba con horror.
Testigos del ataque aseguraron que el cocodrilo mantuvo atrapado el brazo del turista durante mÃ¡s de 30 minutos. El reptil no solo lo arrastrÃ³ varios metros, sino que girÃ³ sobre sÃ­ mismo en el agua, una tÃ©cnica comÃºnmente utilizada por estos animales para someter a sus presas.
[@magandangumagapil]Si Kuya Sinakmal ng Buwaya. A 10-foot-long crocodile bit and seriously injured a man who, out of curiosity, jumped into its enclosure in Siay town, Zamboanga [#ai] [#trending] [#fyp] [#firstvideoofLalay] [#manbitbycrocodile] [#firstvideoofmenbitbylalay] [#follower] [#menbitbycrocodil] [#funnyvideos] [â™¬ original sound - BUHAY TINDERO]
La situaciÃ³n se volviÃ³ crÃ­tica hasta que un cuidador del parque intervino. Para liberar al joven, el domador de reptiles tuvo que golpear al cocodrilo en la cabeza con un pequeÃ±o bloque de cemento.
El turista sufriÃ³ graves heridas y fue hospitalizado
Una vez liberado, el turista fue asistido por el equipo mÃ©dico del zoolÃ³gico, que le vendÃ³ el brazo antes de trasladarlo a un hospital cercano. SegÃºn informaron, recibiÃ³ 50 puntos de sutura debido a las profundas heridas provocadas por la mordida.
El sargento de la policÃ­a local, Joel Sajolga, confirmÃ³ a los medios que el turista se encontraba caminando por el parque cuando vio al cocodrilo y lo confundiÃ³ con un objeto de plÃ¡stico. Fue entonces cuando decidiÃ³ saltar la barrera de seguridad e ingresar al recinto.
